description:
A Million Shades of Fun
The MUST HAVE Photo/Video App
 
******Achievements******
• App Store BEST of 2012 in iTunes App Store (China)
• Staff Favorites in iTunes App Store
• App of the Week in iTunes App Store
• No.1 App in Photo/Video category or all categories in nearly 100 countries
• Over 120 Million Downloads so far

******What the media says******
• ...offers a tremendous variety of features for the photo enthusiast... --- TUAW
• ...the ideal camera companion for creating unique and visually interesting photos... --- AppCraver
• this application is phenomenal and well-worth the download.--- iPhone Life Magzine

******Features******

** Shoot
• 8 camera modes: Magic Shot, Panorama,Tilt-Shift, Color Splash, Touch Shot, Anti-Shaking, Time Lapse & Smile Shot
• Tons of FX with live preview before capture
• Fast shooting: one second for photo capture and FX applying
• Full HD video recording with live effects

** Edit
• Basic adjustments: Rotate, Flip, Crop, Brightness, Contrast & Saturation
• Advanced options: Enhancements, Face Beauty, FX Applying

** Collage
• 3 modes available: Frame, Free collage & Stitch
• Aspect ratio and border width adjustments
• Round corners for each photo
• Shake to change background, frames & textures

** Share
• Supports popular social networks across the world: Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Tumblr and more
• One-tap uploading to multiple social networks for multiple photos and video
• Copy photos or videos to PC via USB or WiFi
